name: One Night at Remi's
description:
Welcome to your new one night job at Remi's Friend, Food, and Fun and your job will be looking out and making sure no dirty rotten kids get in the building. The characters who you will be staying up all night with are Remi the dog, Noah the wolf, Shroomy the mushroom, Stan the Cheetah, and we can't forget out lovely greeter, Roxi the dog. When you check out the place go to the door and exit to start you night shift. We hope you enjoy your one night here.

Have fun, Box Head Entertainment
